channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-1993] Check in the demo used by the Java in the Database session at Apachecon 2006
item.description: My session at Apachecon 2006 (Austin) included a demo, showing how to use user-coded Java functions and procedures inside the Derby engine. I would like to check this demo into the Derby demo directory.
item.summary: Check in the demo used by the Java in the Database session at Apachecon 2006

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attaching demo as a patch. This introduces the following files. The README file explains what the demo does and how to compile/run it.

A java/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/customizeMe.properties
A java/demo/scores/java
A java/demo/scores/java/server
A java/demo/scores/java/server/com
A java/demo/scores/java/server/com/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/server/com/scores/proc
A java/demo/scores/java/server/com/scores/proc/Functions.java
A java/demo/scores/java/server/com/scores/proc/Procedures.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common
A java/demo/scores/java/common/com
A java/demo/scores/java/common/com/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/common/com/scores/util
A java/demo/scores/java/common/com/scores/util/Logger.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common/com/scores/util/Utils.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores/app
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores/app/Scores.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores/data
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores/data/Database.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/com/scores/data/Data.java
A java/demo/scores/README
A java/demo/scores/build.xml

The package for this demo is 'com.scores' which is not in the apache namespace of 'org.apache'.
Does that need to be changed?

Hadn't occurred to me. Java code in our other demos doesn't live in the org.apache namespace but instead just lives in the top level, nameless package. It does makes some sense for this code to live in an apache namespace. How about org.apache.derby.demo.scores...?

Attaching v02 of this submission. This moves the classes into an apache namespace rooted at org.apache.derby.demo.scores:

A java/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/customizeMe.properties
A java/demo/scores/java
A java/demo/scores/java/server
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby/demo
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/proc
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/proc/Functions.java
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/proc/Procedures.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby/demo
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/util
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/util/Logger.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/util/Utils.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/app
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/app/Scores.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/data
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/data/Database.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derby/demo/scores/data/Data.java
A java/demo/scores/README
A java/demo/scores/build.xml

org.apache.derby.* has been reserved for "product" code, e.g. testing is under o.a.derbyTesting, build under o.a.derbyBuild,
so it seems logically there would be a o.a.derbyDemo.

To increase security of Derby I've been testing with denying the ability to create routines that map to methods (or call methods) within the
org.apache.derby namespace. While this logic could be modfied to allow methods in derby.demo, seems a better approach might be to not have demo code in the o.a.derby namespace.

Can you recommend a namespace that's OK? It seems like we need a namespace which belongs to Apache but not to Derby. That is, one which begins with org.apache but not with org.apache.derby. At first blush, this would seem to mean some negotiation with the larger Apache community in order to reserve another branch of org.apache for our demos.

How about modelling this on the package structure for our build tools? We could use the following namespace for Derby demos:

org.apache.derbyDemo

rather than org.apache.derby.demo.

Attaching derby-1993-v03.diff. This relocates the classes to the org.apache.derbyDemo namespace. Affected files are:

A java/demo/scores
A java/demo/scores/customizeMe.properties
A java/demo/scores/java
A java/demo/scores/java/server
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derbyDemo
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/proc
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/proc/Functions.java
A java/demo/scores/java/server/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/proc/Procedures.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derbyDemo
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/util
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/util/Logger.java
A java/demo/scores/java/common/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/util/Utils.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/app
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/app/Scores.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/data
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/data/Database.java
A java/demo/scores/java/client/org/apache/derbyDemo/scores/data/Data.java
A java/demo/scores/README
A java/demo/scores/build.xml
